channel.title: [Class Suggestion]] Councilor
channel.description:
## Councilor _Social Class / Neutral_ **Objective:** Your win condition is the same as the first king.
----------
**Passive: Secret Plans** You know the faction of the first king. Your win condition is the same as the first king.
**Passive: Political Immunity** Negate the votes of the first player who target you. They can't accuse or vote you today. They are not notified when this happens. You lost this ability when the first King die.
**Day: Cheating Vote (∞)** Force a player to vote Execute or Pardon.
**Night: Banish (2)** Target player can't speaks, whispers or votes for the next day. They are not notified when this happens.
